actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to incorporate the American Blood Commission.

summary.text: Grants a Federal charter to the American Blood Commission. Declares that the purposes of such organization are: (1) to implement the national blood policy, as announced in the Federal Register by the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare, and (2) to carry out programs to develop an adequate, voluntary supply of blood and blood products to meet the health needs of the nation.

titles.title: A bill to incorporate the American Blood Commission.
